title: Bugged Client
body:
My client is really buggy since last patch. The login screen does not display a background or animation, it is a black screen.  Now my chat/friend/notifications do not work, they just flash, and they are not clickable. 

http://imgur.com/a/YpilI

replies.body:
It looks like you've got some old assets from a really old version of the client. I recommend [running a complete repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of the client's files to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this helped.
Issue is resolved, thanks for help I appreciate it.
